mapper.select: select defno, title, writer, defdate from ( select defno, title, content, defdate, writer, row_number() over(order by defno desc) as rNum from board ) nt where rNum between 1 and 10 order by defno desc;
mapper.insert: insert into board(defno, title, content, deffile, defdate, writer, type) values(def_seq.nextval, #{title}, #{content}, #{deffile}, sysdate, #{writer}, #{type})
mapper.update: update board set title=#{title}, content=#{content}, defdate=sysdate where defno = #{defno}
